Good Comments: Undertranslated: Keikaku means plan, and Ahiru means Duck.
There've been some minor problems with some of the German Names (e.g. Raetsel, Autor), but apart from that, very decent work!
Beautiful looking subtitles, easy to follow, and color-coded for characters.  This is the way to go.
Bad Comments: Nice text styles.  Very pretty OP and ED subs.  Overall good translation.
Very high quality work, and some obvious love was put into it with the liner notes

Good Comments: I liked how they included the songs that were played during the episodes, too.
